title: Questor: this British tech star is recovering well but looks cheap relative to peers. Buy
text:
Questor share tip: cyber security firm NCC has fixed its staffing problems, while sales and margins are rising

It has been another run-of-the-mill few weeks in the netherworld of cybercrime.

Aerospace giant Airbus warned it had been hit by hackers targeting its suppliers in search of commercial secrets. Medical appointments were held up in parts of Australia after hospital computer networks suffered a ransomware attack.

And General Sir Nick Carter, Chief of the Defence Staff, said Britain was “at war every day” against cyberattacks from Russia and beyond.
